attributes.action: Ensure that Dr al-Zayyat is suspended and struck off following her abject failure to dispense her duties in the case of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The failure of this Doctor to notice shockling neglect and maltreatment in the case of Baby P or to diagnose fractured ribs and a broekn spine is incomprehensible. This doctor should never be allowed to practice medicine in the united kingdom and should be held professionally accoutable for her shocking neglect and failure to fulfill her professional responsibilities.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
